user_query: I want to search for a mortgage with a repayment period of 720 days, for a property value of 500,000 pounds, and a mortgage amount of 300,000 pounds. Please provide me with the search results sorted by the initial rate. Also, give me the latest foreign exchange rates for GBP.

TaskList.description: Search for mortgage options based on the specified parameters: repayment period of 720 days, property value of 500,000 pounds, and mortgage amount of 300,000 pounds.
Sort the mortgage options by the initial rate once the search results are retrieved.
Retrieve the latest foreign exchange rates for GBP.
